Trade/Device Name(s): Calibrator for the ADVIA Centaur System
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bayer Troponin I Ultra Assay and Calibrator for ADVIA Centaur for quantitative cardiac troponin I measurement in serum and plasma
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative determination of cardiac troponin I in serum, heparinized or EDTA plasma to aid in diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification of acute coronary syndrome patients; calibrator for use in assay calibration.
